title: What is RPO & How to Avoid Downtime
description:
Businesses accept higher customer and economic risk when they live with disaster recovery plans that don’t meet a zero recovery point objective. According to 2020 research from Gartner the average cost of IT downtime is $5,600 per minute.Â With new advances in technology and products like CockroachDB, businesses no longer need to choose higher risk in order to manage complexity.
Why RPO and RTO are so Important to Business Success Businesses care deeply about ensuring the resiliency and uptime of applications.
